players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Alice, watch out! I'm the mafioso. Be careful who you trust."
You: "Bob, thanks for the warning. Let's work together to find other mafia."
Diana: "Thanks Bob, we'll be cautious. Alice, any clues from your investigation?"
Diana: "Will keep an eye on Alice and Bob. Stay alert!"
Bob: "Alice, keep investigating. Diana, stay sharp. I'll protect us."
You: "Diana, check on Bob; Alice, continue investigating. Stay alert!"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Alice is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice, watch out! I'm the mafioso. Be careful who you trust."
Alice: "Bob, thanks for the warning. Let's work together to find other mafia."
Diana: "Thanks Bob, we'll be cautious. Alice, any clues from your investigation?"
Diana: "Will keep an eye on Alice and Bob. Stay alert!"
You: "Alice, keep investigating. Diana, stay sharp. I'll protect us."
Alice: "Diana, check on Bob; Alice, continue investigating. Stay alert!"
